UCI Paul Merage School of Business





Leadership for a Digitally Driven World
Our core belief is that leadership in a digital world is very different from the past, demanding a reinvention of business education.
Why Merage
Watch Full Video




















Academic Programs
Your future is within reach. Our world-class programs and innovative curriculum will expand your opportunities to excel as a leader in a digitally driven world.











See More

Undergraduate
Our team-based program provides you with essential leadership skills in a global context.






See More

MBA
We offer nationally ranked programs including Full-Time MBA, Fully Employed MBA and MBA for Executives.






See More

Specialty Masters
We offer nationally ranked programs including MFin, MPAc, MIE, and MSBA.






See More

PhD
Lead business education and research for the digitally driven world.






See More

Certificates
Prepare to face the complex issues and dynamic challenges of our rapidly changing, hyper-competitive economy.
